General.Name: Tirupati Graphite plc
General.Description: Tirupati Graphite plc, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a specialist graphite and graphene producer in Madagascar and India. It owns and operates the Vatomina and Sahamamy flake graphite projects located in Madagascar. The company also provides mineral processing technology development services. Its products are used in refractory, lubrication, fire retardant, gasket and foil, battery and energy storage, and other applications. Tirupati Graphite plc has a research collaboration agreement with Monash University. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 49 Berkeley Square, London, United Kingdom, W1J 5AZ
